identity.mission: Create an ultra-premium, 5-star luxury experience that exudes opulence and exclusivity.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix luxury hospitality with high-end fashion editorial aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every interaction must feel expensive, deliberate, and cinematic.
Content is King: Use full-bleed imagery and storytelling to sell the dream.
Negative Space: Extreme padding to create a sense of exclusivity and calm.
Contrast: High contrast between deep void backgrounds and shimmering gold accents.

usage.h1: text-5xl md:text-7xl font-heading tracking-tight leading-[1.1] text-cream
usage.caption: text-xs font-body uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-gold-dark

colors.theme_strategy: Dark Mode Luxury (Jewel Archetype). The interface should feel like a dimly lit, high-end lounge. Use deep blacks and charcoals, not flat greys. Gold is used sparingly for focus.

textures.noise: Use a subtle noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on the background to prevent banding and add 'film grain' texture.
textures.gradients: Use radial gradients for spotlights. Example: 'bg-[radial-gradient(circle_at_center,_var(--tw-gradient-stops))] from-gold/10 via-transparent to-transparent'

marketing.grid: The 'Tetris' Grid. Asymmetrical layouts. Overlapping images and text.
marketing.spacing: Generous. Section padding: py-24 or py-32. Gap: gap-12 or gap-16.
marketing.hero: Full-screen cinematic video or parallax image. Text overlay is minimal and elegant.

dashboard.grid: The 'Control Room' Grid. Dense but breathable.
dashboard.container: Glassmorphism panels floating on a dark background.
dashboard.sidebar: Thin, elegant, possibly collapsed by default to maximize content area.

buttons.primary: bg-gold text-black hover:bg-gold-light transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-8 py-4
buttons.outline: border border-gold/50 text-gold hover:bg-gold/10 transition-all duration-300 rounded-sm uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-8 py-4
buttons.ghost: text-cream/60 hover:text-gold transition-colors uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-gold px-0 py-4 rounded-none transition-colors placeholder:text-white/20 text-cream
inputs.label: uppercase tracking-widest text-[10px] text-gold/80 mb-2 block

cards.marketing: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-none border border-white/5 bg-black/20 hover:border-gold/30 transition-all duration-500

motion.principles: Slow, smooth, and deliberate. No bouncy springs.
motion.scroll: Parallax effects on images. Text reveals (fade up) as user scrolls.

hero_banquet.alt: Grand luxury banquet hall with crystal chandeliers

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME SETUP: Update tailwind.config.js with the new color palette (Void Black, Gold, Cream). Ensure 'darkMode' is active.
2. GLOBAL STYLES: Update index.css to set the background to #050505 and text to #F5F5F0. Add the noise texture overlay.
3. LANDING PAGE: Build a 'Cinematic' landing page. Use the 'hero_banquet' image as a full-screen background with a dark overlay. Use Playfair Display for the main headline 'Mayur Simran Banquet'.
4. DASHBOARD: Redesign the admin layout. Use a sidebar with glassmorphism. Cards should be dark with subtle gold borders.
5. COMPONENTS: Customize Shadcn components. Remove default rounded-md and use rounded-sm or rounded-none for a sharper, more premium look. Update primary button styles to match the Gold palette.
6. IMAGERY: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
7. CRITICAL: Do not use standard 'blue' links or buttons. Everything must fit the Gold/Black/Cream aesthetic.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Dark Mode Only: The app is strictly dark mode for luxury.
Micro-interactions: Every button and card must have a hover state.
Data-TestID: Add data-testid to all interactive elements.
